Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe have grown to be a fighting side in the last few years, culminating in their ODI and T20I series wins over Bangladesh in July 2022.
Zimbabwe are one of the most talked-about teams, having just defeated pre-tournament favourites Pakistan by one run.

Bangladesh are back in trouble in T20Is. After they beat Netherlands in their first game, there was hope that the fast-bowling unit could keep them afloat if the batting can come in support. But neither clicked against South Africa.
Team news: Zimbabwe are unlikely to tinker with their playing XI.
Bangladesh may want to bring back Yasir Ali as batting insurance but then they'll have to get creative with their fifth-bowling option
